repl_description:
A professional resume website template built with Flask and Bootstrap, featuring Introduction, Skills, Experience, Education, Portfolio, and Blog sections. The website includes project showcase cards, dynamic blog content management through SQLite integration, and Flask-SQLAlchemy models. A comprehensive documentation suite details installation procedures, project structure, and development guidelines.

The application implements theme switching with dark mode functionality and localStorage persistence, responsive animations, and smooth scrolling across all sections. Blog posts and portfolio items integrate with the theme system while maintaining responsive design principles across different device sizes.

Tech Stack:
- Flask
- Flask-SQLAlchemy
- SQLite
- Bootstrap
- Custom CSS
- localStorage for theme persistence
- CSS Animations
